source.data:
@homepage @regression
Feature: Homepage Overview

    Background: Navigate to the Flashycards application
        Given I navigate to the flashycards homepage

    @smoke
    Scenario: Homepage displays correct items
        Then The page title should be 'Flashycards'
        And The page should contain 'Flashy Card Sets'
        And The page should contain 'My Own Card Sets'
        And The page should contain 'Pick a set to begin!'

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage

scenario.name: Homepage displays correct items

steps.text: The page title should be 'Flashycards'
The page should contain 'Flashy Card Sets'
The page should contain 'My Own Card Sets'
The page should contain 'Pick a set to begin!'

pickle.name: Homepage displays correct items

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
The page title should be 'Flashycards'
The page should contain 'Flashy Card Sets'
The page should contain 'My Own Card Sets'
The page should contain 'Pick a set to begin!'

pattern.source: ^The create new set overview should contain the text '(.*)'
^The create new set overview should display the button '(.*)'
^The window '(.*)' should be displayed in the center

source.data:
@left-nav-bar @regression
Feature: Left Navigation Bar Overview

    Background: Navigate to the Flashycards application
        Given I navigate to the flashycards homepage

    @smoke
    Scenario: Left navigation bar displays correct items
        Then The left navigation bar should contain 'Spanish'
        And The left navigation bar should contain 'Nouns'
        And The left navigation bar should contain 'Adjectives'
        And The left navigation bar should contain 'Verbs'


    Scenario: Left navigation bar displays the correct categories for the chosen language
        Then The set language should be 'Spanish'
        And The category 'Nouns' is for the language 'Spanish'
        And The category 'Adjectives' is for the language 'Spanish'
        And The category 'Verbs' is for the language 'Spanish'


    Scenario: Left navigation bar displays the correct sets for the chosen category - Nouns
        When I select the category 'Nouns'
        Then The left navigation bar should contain 'People'
        And The left navigation bar should contain 'Animals'


    Scenario: Left navigation bar displays the correct sets for the chosen category - Adjectives
        When I select the category 'Adjectives'
        Then The left navigation bar should contain 'Shapes'
        And The left navigation bar should contain 'Colours'


    Scenario: Left navigation bar displays the correct sets for the chosen category - Verbs
        When I select the category 'Verbs'
        Then The left navigation bar should contain 'Frequently used'

    @smoke
    Scenario: When I click on a set name, the widget 'Set Overview' should be opened

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage

scenario.name: Left navigation bar displays correct items

steps.text: The left navigation bar should contain 'Spanish'
The left navigation bar should contain 'Nouns'
The left navigation bar should contain 'Adjectives'
The left navigation bar should contain 'Verbs'

scenario.name: Left navigation bar displays the correct categories for the chosen language

steps.text: The set language should be 'Spanish'
The category 'Nouns' is for the language 'Spanish'
The category 'Adjectives' is for the language 'Spanish'
The category 'Verbs' is for the language 'Spanish'

scenario.name: Left navigation bar displays the correct sets for the chosen category - Nouns

steps.text: I select the category 'Nouns'
The left navigation bar should contain 'People'
The left navigation bar should contain 'Animals'

scenario.name: Left navigation bar displays the correct sets for the chosen category - Adjectives

steps.text: I select the category 'Adjectives'
The left navigation bar should contain 'Shapes'
The left navigation bar should contain 'Colours'

scenario.name: Left navigation bar displays the correct sets for the chosen category - Verbs

steps.text: I select the category 'Verbs'
The left navigation bar should contain 'Frequently used'

scenario.name: When I click on a set name, the widget 'Set Overview' should be opened

pickle.name: Left navigation bar displays correct items

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
The left navigation bar should contain 'Spanish'
The left navigation bar should contain 'Nouns'
The left navigation bar should contain 'Adjectives'
The left navigation bar should contain 'Verbs'

pickle.name: Left navigation bar displays the correct categories for the chosen language

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
The set language should be 'Spanish'
The category 'Nouns' is for the language 'Spanish'
The category 'Adjectives' is for the language 'Spanish'
The category 'Verbs' is for the language 'Spanish'

The left navigation bar should contain 'Colours'

pickle.name: Left navigation bar displays the correct sets for the chosen category - Verbs

source.data:
@right-nav-bar @not-ready
Feature: Right Navigation Bar Overview

    Background: Navigate to the Flashycards application
        Given I navigate to the flashycards homepage

    @smoke
    Scenario: Right navigation bar displays correct items
        Then The right navigation bar should contain 'Create a New Set'

    @smoke
    Scenario: Verify that the Create Set link works
        When I click on 'Create Set'
        Then The window 'createOwnSet' should be displayed in the center

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage

scenario.name: Right navigation bar displays correct items

steps.text: The right navigation bar should contain 'Create a New Set'

scenario.name: Verify that the Create Set link works

steps.text: I click on 'Create Set'
The window 'createOwnSet' should be displayed in the center

pickle.name: Right navigation bar displays correct items

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
The right navigation bar should contain 'Create a New Set'

pickle.name: Verify that the Create Set link works

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
I click on 'Create Set'
The window 'createOwnSet' should be displayed in the center

source.data:
@flashcards @flashcards-set-overview @not-ready
Feature: Flashcards Set Overview

    Background: Navigate to the Flashycards application - Set Overview widget
        Given I navigate to the flashycards homepage
        When I select the category 'Nouns'
        And I open the set 'People'

    @smoke
    Scenario: Flashcards - Set Overview displays correct items
        Then The window 'setOverviewContainer' should be displayed in the center
        And The set overview should contain 'Set overview'
        And The set overview should contain 'Sister'
        And The set overview should contain 'Hermana'
        And The set overview should contain 'Next'
        And The set overview should contain 'Start Practice!'

    Scenario: When I click on the 'Next' button, the next word containers should appear

    Scenario: When I click on the 'Previous' button, the previous word containers should appear

    @smoke
    Scenario: When I click on the 'Start Practice' button, the flashcard practice should be opened to the first word

background.name: Navigate to the Flashycards application - Set Overview widget

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
I select the category 'Nouns'
I open the set 'People'

scenario.name: Flashcards - Set Overview displays correct items

steps.text: The window 'setOverviewContainer' should be displayed in the center
The set overview should contain 'Set overview'
The set overview should contain 'Sister'
The set overview should contain 'Hermana'
The set overview should contain 'Next'
The set overview should contain 'Start Practice!'

scenario.name: When I click on the 'Next' button, the next word containers should appear
When I click on the 'Previous' button, the previous word containers should appear
When I click on the 'Start Practice' button, the flashcard practice should be opened to the first word

pickle.name: Flashcards - Set Overview displays correct items

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
I select the category 'Nouns'
I open the set 'People'
The window 'setOverviewContainer' should be displayed in the center
The set overview should contain 'Set overview'
The set overview should contain 'Sister'
The set overview should contain 'Hermana'
The set overview should contain 'Next'
The set overview should contain 'Start Practice!'

pickle.name: When I click on the 'Next' button, the next word containers should appear
When I click on the 'Previous' button, the previous word containers should appear
When I click on the 'Start Practice' button, the flashcard practice should be opened to the first word

pattern.source: ^The create new set overview should contain the text '(.*)'
^The create new set overview should display the button '(.*)'
^The window '(.*)' should be displayed in the center

source.data:
@flashcards @flashcards-practice @not-ready
Feature: Flashcards Practice

    Background: Navigate to the Flashycards application - Practice Overview widget
        Given I navigate to the flashycards homepage
        When I select the category 'Nouns'
        And I open the set 'People'
        And I start the flashcard practice

    @smoke
    Scenario: Flashcards - practice is correctly displayed
        Then The window 'flashcard' should be displayed in the center
        And The flashcard should display the text 'I'
        And The flashcard should contain the button 'hintButton'

    Scenario: Flascards - practice hint button functions correctly
        When I click on the 'hintButton' button
        Then The flashcard should display the text 'Y'

    Scenario: Flascards - practice reveal button functions correctly
        When I click on the 'revealButton' button
        Then The flashcard should display the text 'Yo'
        And The flashcard should contain the button 'nextWordButton'

background.name: Navigate to the Flashycards application - Practice Overview widget

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
I select the category 'Nouns'
I open the set 'People'
I start the flashcard practice

scenario.name: Flashcards - practice is correctly displayed

steps.text: The window 'flashcard' should be displayed in the center
The flashcard should display the text 'I'
The flashcard should contain the button 'hintButton'

scenario.name: Flascards - practice hint button functions correctly

steps.text: I click on the 'hintButton' button
The flashcard should display the text 'Y'

scenario.name: Flascards - practice reveal button functions correctly

steps.text: I click on the 'revealButton' button
The flashcard should display the text 'Yo'
The flashcard should contain the button 'nextWordButton'

pickle.name: Flashcards - practice is correctly displayed

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
I select the category 'Nouns'
I open the set 'People'
I start the flashcard practice
The window 'flashcard' should be displayed in the center
The flashcard should display the text 'I'
The flashcard should contain the button 'hintButton'

pickle.name: Flascards - practice hint button functions correctly

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
I select the category 'Nouns'
I open the set 'People'
I start the flashcard practice
I click on the 'hintButton' button
The flashcard should display the text 'Y'

pickle.name: Flascards - practice reveal button functions correctly

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
I select the category 'Nouns'
I open the set 'People'
I start the flashcard practice
I click on the 'revealButton' button
The flashcard should display the text 'Yo'
The flashcard should contain the button 'nextWordButton'

^The create new set overview should display the button '(.*)'
^The window '(.*)' should be displayed in the center

source.data:
@create-new-set @not-ready
Feature: Create New Set

    Background: Navigate to the Flashycards application - create set widget
        Given I navigate to the flashycards homepage
        When I click on 'Create Set'

    @smoke
    Scenario: Create new set first displays start window
        Then The window 'createNewSetStart' should be displayed in the center
        And The create new set overview should display the button 'startCreatingButton'

    @smoke
    Scenario: The start creating button functions
        When I click on the button 'startCreatingButton'
        Then The window 'createNewSetForm' should be displayed in the center

    @smoke
    Scenario: The create new set form displays the correct items
        When I click on the button 'startCreatingButton'
        Then The create new set overview should display the button 'createSetButton'
        And The create new set overview should display the button 'moreFieldsButton'

background.name: Navigate to the Flashycards application - create set widget

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
I click on 'Create Set'

scenario.name: Create new set first displays start window

steps.text: The window 'createNewSetStart' should be displayed in the center
The create new set overview should display the button 'startCreatingButton'

scenario.name: The start creating button functions

steps.text: I click on the button 'startCreatingButton'
The window 'createNewSetForm' should be displayed in the center

scenario.name: The create new set form displays the correct items

steps.text: I click on the button 'startCreatingButton'
The create new set overview should display the button 'createSetButton'
The create new set overview should display the button 'moreFieldsButton'

pickle.name: Create new set first displays start window

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
I click on 'Create Set'
The window 'createNewSetStart' should be displayed in the center
The create new set overview should display the button 'startCreatingButton'

pickle.name: The start creating button functions

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
I click on 'Create Set'
I click on the button 'startCreatingButton'
The window 'createNewSetForm' should be displayed in the center

pickle.name: The create new set form displays the correct items

steps.text: I navigate to the flashycards homepage
I click on 'Create Set'
I click on the button 'startCreatingButton'
The create new set overview should display the button 'createSetButton'
The create new set overview should display the button 'moreFieldsButton'

source.data:
@footer-menu @not-ready
Feature: Footer Menu

    Background: Navigate to the Flashycards application
        Given I navigate to the flashycards homepage

    @smoke
    Scenario: Footer menu displays correct items
        Then The footer menu should contain 'About Flashycards'

    @smoke
    Scenario: Footer menu is displayed by default when opening the app
        Then The window 'aboutFlashycards' should be displayed in the center

    @smoke
    Scenario: Footer menu link opens correct widget
        When I select the category 'Nouns'
        When I open the set 'People'
        Then The window 'setOverviewContainer' should be displayed in the center
        When I select the link 'aboutFlashy'
        Then The window 'aboutFlashycards' should be displayed in the center

steps.text: The window 'aboutFlashycards' should be displayed in the center

scenario.name: Footer menu link opens correct widget

I open the set 'People'
The window 'setOverviewContainer' should be displayed in the center
I select the link 'aboutFlashy'
The window 'aboutFlashycards' should be displayed in the center
